ygData.subject: Re: bronze weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, yes.  The only place I know of that sells the pet spells of 8th level and higher is in High Hold Keep, and the only place I ve seen the Enchant
ygData.messageBody:
Steven wrote:
> Also, I've notice that guilds don't sell the complete spells for each level (ie Mercyl's Animation, and Enchant Silver (would love to try my luck at making magical jewelry)). Are these truely Uncommon/Rare as EverQuest Stratics say they are?

Actually, yes. The only place I know of that sells the pet spells of
8th level and higher is in High Hold Keep, and the only place I've seen
the Enchant metal spells is in Nerriak, although a friend of mine says
he's seen them in Qeynos also.

-Bukaru, Dark Elf Enchanter
